data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Tearce, North Macedonia need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tearce, North Macedonia
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 38 believers living in Tearce, North Macedonia.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Tearce, North Macedonia that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Tearce, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Albanian, Macedonian people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Albanian, Macedonian people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Albanian, Macedonian people is yours.
Spirit, please convict each believer in Tearce, North Macedonia to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 22,462 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 22,462 lost in Tearce that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Father, help the 38 believers in Tearce to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 22,462 lost friends and neighbors.
